pkgmetadata.longdescription: # BEEComThis is a simple console writen in python to control the BEETHEFIRST 3D printer from BEEVERYCREATIVE.To use this tool clone the current repository to your computer and run it bu calling "python beeconsole.py"## Requirements- Python 2.7- pyusb- libusb## Installation### Mac OSX- Install brew package manager (http://brew.sh)- Install python 2.7 (https://www.python.org)- Install pyusb (run "sudo pip install pyusb" in a terminal window)- Install libusb (run "brew install libusb" in a terminal window)### Linux- Install python 2.7 (run "sudo apt-get install python" in a terminal window)- Install pip (run "sudo apt-get install python-pip" in a terminal window)- Install pyusb (run "sudo pip install pyusb" in a terminal window)## Run### Mac OSX$python beeconsole.py
